verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Jehu<WH3058> the son<WH1121> of Hanani<WH2607> against Baasha,<WH1201> saying,<WH559>

"Because I exalted<WH7311> you out of the dust,<WH6083> and made<WH5414> you prince<WH5057> over my people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> and you have walked<WH3212> in the way<WH1870> of Jeroboam,<WH3379> and have made my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> to sin,<WH2398> to provoke me to anger<WH3707> with their sins;<WH2403>

behold,<WH1197> I will utterly sweep away Baasha<WH1201> and his<WH310> house;<WH1004> and I will make<WH5414> your house<WH1004> like the house<WH1004> of Jeroboam<WH3379> the son<WH1121> of Nebat.<WH5028>

The dogs<WH3611> will eat<WH398> Baasha<WH1201>'s descendants who die<WH4191> in the city;<WH5892> and he who dies<WH4191> of his in the field<WH7704> the birds<WH5775> of the sky<WH8064> will eat.<WH398>"

Now the rest<WH3499> of the acts<WH1697> of Baasha,<WH1201> and what he did,<WH6213> and his might,<WH1369> aren't<WH3789> they written in the book<WH5612> of the chronicles<WH1697> of the kings<WH4428> of Israel?<WH3478>
Baasha<WH1201> slept<WH7901> with his fathers,<WH1> and was buried<WH6912> in Tirzah;<WH8656> and Elah<WH425> his son<WH1121> reigned in his place.<WH4427>

Moreover by<WH3027> the prophet<WH5030> Jehu<WH3058> the son<WH1121> of Hanani<WH2607> came the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> against Baasha,<WH1201> and against his house,<WH1004> both because of all the evil<WH7451> that he did<WH6213> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh,<WH3068> to provoke him to anger<WH3707> with the work<WH4639> of his hands,<WH3027> in being like the house<WH1004> of Jeroboam,<WH3379> and because he struck him.<WH5221>

In the twenty<WH6242> - sixth<WH8337> year<WH8141> of Asa<WH609> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> Elah<WH425> the son<WH1121> of Baasha<WH1201> began to reign<WH4427> over Israel<WH3478> in Tirzah<WH8656> for two years.<WH8141>

His servant<WH5650> Zimri,<WH2174> captain<WH8269> of half<WH4276> his chariots,<WH7393> conspired<WH7194> against him.<WH8656> Now he was in Tirzah, drinking<WH8354> himself drunk<WH7910> in the house<WH1004> of Arza,<WH777> who was over the household<WH1004> in Tirzah:<WH8656>

and Zimri<WH2174> went in<WH935> and struck<WH5221> him,<WH4191> and killed him,<WH6242> in the twenty - seventh<WH7651> year<WH8141> of Asa<WH609> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and reigned in his place.<WH4427>

It happened,<WH4427> when he began to reign, as soon as he sat<WH3427> on his throne,<WH3678> that he struck<WH5221> all the house<WH1004> of Baasha:<WH1201> he didn't<WH7604> leave him a single one who urinates<WH8366> on a wall,<WH7023> neither of his relatives,<WH1350> nor of his friends.<WH7453>

Thus Zimri<WH2174> destroyed<WH8045> all the house<WH1004> of Baasha,<WH1201> according to the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> which he spoke<WH1696> against Baasha<WH1201> by<WH3027> Jehu<WH3058> the prophet,<WH5030>

for all the sins<WH2403> of Baasha,<WH1201> and the sins<WH2403> of Elah<WH425> his son,<WH1121> which they sinned,<WH2398> and with which they made Israel<WH3478> to sin,<WH2398> to provoke Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> to anger<WH3707> with their vanities.<WH1892>
Now the rest<WH3499> of the acts<WH1697> of Elah,<WH425> and all that he did,<WH6213> aren't<WH3789> they written in the book<WH5612> of the chronicles<WH1697> of the kings<WH4428> of Israel?<WH3478>

In the twenty<WH6242> - seventh<WH7651> year<WH8141> of Asa<WH609> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> Zimri<WH2174> reigned<WH4427> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> in Tirzah.<WH8656> Now the people<WH5971> were encamped<WH2583> against Gibbethon,<WH1405> which belonged to the Philistines.<WH6430>

The people<WH5971> who were encamped<WH2583> heard<WH8085> say,<WH559> Zimri<WH2174> has conspired,<WH7194> and has also struck<WH5221> the king:<WH4428> therefore all Israel<WH3478> made Omri,<WH6018> the captain<WH8269> of the army,<WH6635> king<WH4427> over Israel<WH3478> that day<WH3117> in the camp.<WH4264>
Omri<WH6018> went up<WH5927> from Gibbethon,<WH1405> and all Israel<WH3478> with him,<WH6696> and they besieged Tirzah.<WH8656>

It happened,<WH2174> when Zimri saw<WH7200> that the city<WH5892> was taken,<WH3920> that he went<WH935> into the castle<WH759> of the king<WH4428>'s house,<WH1004> and burnt<WH8313> the king<WH4428>'s house<WH1004> over him with fire,<WH784> and died,<WH4191>

for his sins<WH2403> which he sinned<WH2398> in doing<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh,<WH3068> in walking<WH3212> in the way<WH1870> of Jeroboam,<WH3379> and in his sin<WH2403> which he did,<WH6213> to make Israel<WH3478> to sin.<WH2398>

Now the rest<WH3499> of the acts<WH1697> of Zimri,<WH2174> and his treason<WH7195> that he committed,<WH7194> aren't<WH3789> they written in the book<WH5612> of the chronicles<WH1697> of the kings<WH4428> of Israel?<WH3478>

Then were the people<WH5971> of Israel<WH3478> divided<WH2505> into two parts:<WH2677> half<WH2677> of the people<WH5971> followed<WH1961> Tibni<WH8402> the son<WH1121> of Ginath,<WH1527> to make him king;<WH4427> and half<WH2677> followed<WH310> Omri.<WH6018>

But the people<WH5971> who followed<WH310> Omri<WH6018> prevailed<WH2388> against<WH854> the people<WH5971> who followed<WH310> Tibni<WH8402> the son<WH1121> of Ginath:<WH1527> so Tibni<WH8402> died,<WH4191> and Omri<WH6018> reigned.<WH4427>

In the thirty<WH7970> - first<WH259> year<WH8141> of Asa<WH609> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> Omri<WH6018> began to reign<WH4427> over Israel<WH3478> for twelve<WH8147> years.<WH8141> He reigned<WH4427> six<WH8337> years<WH8141> in Tirzah.<WH8656>

He bought<WH7069> the hill<WH2022> Samaria<WH8111> of Shemer<WH8106> for two talents<WH3603> of silver;<WH3701> and he built<WH1129> on the hill,<WH2022> and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> which he built,<WH1129> after the name<WH8034> of Shemer,<WH8106> the owner<WH113> of the hill,<WH2022> Samaria.<WH8111>
Omri<WH6018> did<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and dealt wickedly above<WH7489> all who were before him.<WH6440>

For he walked<WH3212> in all the way<WH1870> of Jeroboam<WH3379> the son<WH1121> of Nebat,<WH5028> and in his sins<WH2403> with which he made Israel<WH3478> to sin,<WH2398> to provoke Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> to anger<WH3707> with their vanities.<WH1892>

Now the rest<WH3499> of the acts<WH1697> of Omri<WH6018> which he did,<WH6213> and his might<WH1369> that he showed,<WH6213> aren't<WH3789> they written in the book<WH5612> of the chronicles<WH1697> of the kings<WH4428> of Israel?<WH3478>
So Omri<WH6018> slept<WH7901> with his fathers,<WH1> and was buried<WH6912> in Samaria;<WH8111> and Ahab<WH256> his son<WH1121> reigned in his place.<WH4427>

In the thirty<WH7970> - eighth<WH8083> year<WH8141> of Asa<WH609> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> began Ahab<WH256> the son<WH1121> of Omri<WH6018> to reign<WH4427> over Israel:<WH3478> and Ahab<WH256> the son<WH1121> of Omri<WH6018> reigned<WH4427> over Israel<WH3478> in Samaria<WH8111> twenty<WH6242> - two<WH8147> years.<WH8141>
Ahab<WH256> the son<WH1121> of Omri<WH6018> did<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh<WH3068> above all that were before him.<WH6440>

It happened,<WH7043> as if it had been a light thing for him to walk<WH3212> in the sins<WH2403> of Jeroboam<WH3379> the son<WH1121> of Nebat,<WH5028> that he took<WH3947> as wife<WH802> Jezebel<WH348> the daughter<WH1323> of Ethbaal<WH856> king<WH4428> of the Sidonians,<WH6722> and went<WH3212> and served<WH5647> Baal,<WH1168> and worshiped him.<WH7812>
He reared up<WH6965> an altar<WH4196> for Baal<WH1168> in the house<WH1004> of Baal,<WH1168> which he had built<WH1129> in Samaria.<WH8111>

Ahab<WH256> made<WH6213> the Asherah;<WH842> and Ahab<WH256> did<WH6213> yet more<WH3254> to provoke Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> to anger<WH3707> than all the kings<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> who were before him.<WH6440>

In his days<WH3117> Hiel<WH2419> the Bethelite<WH1017> built<WH1129> Jericho:<WH3405> he laid its foundation<WH3245> with the loss of Abiram<WH48> his firstborn,<WH1060> and set up<WH5324> its gates<WH1817> with the loss of his youngest<WH6810> son Segub,<WH7687> according to the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> which he spoke<WH1696> by<WH3027> Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun.<WH5126>
